name: JOHN GREGORY
top_product: Sheet Metal Cabinets Progressive Tools for metal parts Machining jobs in SS, Aluminium, Titanium, Inconel, MS, Plastic (PTFE,Nylon, Delrin, ABS)
ideal_referral: Companies like Bosch, Wipro, Legrand, Schneider, Molex, Aptiv, GE, Tesla, HP, Delly, companies in EV segment who need high volume high precision components.
top_problem_solved: Vguard Industries Limited had moved to sheet metal enclosures during 2012-2013 and we did the prototype and pilot production of their stabilizer cabinets. We have had serious problem in doing volume - max was 240 to 300 nos per day using 2 machines. When the same product was moved to production, idea was put forward and sample was submitted to remove the additional corner fixing plate and this material was created in the main frame itself using an joggling operation. This was accepted prima facie and with this change, we were able to do production of about 2100 to 2400 nos per shift using the same two machines. This change has become a standard now in all their sheet metal designs.
my_favourite_bni_story: We got a casual enquiry on display stand for displaying electrical items in January 2021 from one of our members. By March 2021, we were asked to submit a prototype. Sample was approved by April 2021 and got the first order for 600 units, followed by many more. By December 2022, we got order for over 4000 units and thank you note close to about 1.4Crores. This segment was totally new to us and our first one which was very fruitful. Thank You BNI

name: JOSH JAISON MATHEW
top_product: HR Consulting (Tailored to your business) Custom HR Policy & Procedure Development Offer Letters, Joining Letters & Exit Forms Compensation & Benefits Structuring Payroll & Payslip Management Employee File Systems & Performance Tracking
ideal_referral: Startup consultants, business coaches, CAs, and branding agencies working with growing businesses that lack structured HR — we can help your clients thrive with the right systems and culture.
top_problem_solved: Story 1 – Fast-Growing Tech Company This client operated on Sundays and had no proper HR documentation. We created a custom leave policy, a 31-page employee handbook, and employee files to track performance. Now, the company functions with clarity, their culture is stronger, and their team feels supported as they expand into new locations. ____________________________ Story 2 – Mid-Sized Distribution Business The business was growing but had zero clarity in roles, responsibilities, or team performance. We stepped in with our Virtual HR team, mapped out clear job roles, set up performance review systems, and introduced essential HR documents. Today, their operations run smoother and the leadership finally has time to focus on strategy instead of staff issues.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of our clients recently said: “Now that HR runs on its own, I finally have time to spend with my family.” That’s the power of great HR — it doesn’t just support the business; it gives the founder their peace of mind back.
